original_text: And the Lord directed me at that time to teach you the decrees and laws you are to follow in the land that you are crossing the Jordan to possess.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 내게 명령하사 너희에게 규례와 법도를 교훈하게 하셨나니 이는 너희가 거기로 건너가 받을 땅에서 행하게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord directed me at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님께서 그 때 나를 인도하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: to teach you the decrees and laws
you are to follow in the land
